page.title: 12A changing Fraserburgh
page.content: In the late '70s and early '80s Fraserburgh has grown by about 1sq.km. as a result of{Scottish Special {Housing Association, local authority, and{private housing}developments. This development continues and is located in the following areas of the town;{Watermill, South Middleburgh, {Lochpots, north of Kirktown. A development company called {Fraserburgh Limited}was set up in{1984 by the local business community,Banff & Buchan and Grampian Councils, and the Scottish and North East Scotland Development Agencies in an attempt to help{create new jobs and to safeguard {existing jobs.}In its first year the company has created or saved at least 130 jobs and has a{target of 650 jobs over 3 years. It is hoped that these developments will help the local fight against unemployment.
